titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Don Schmidt Collection of NC State Athletics Memorabilia

editionstmt.p: Finding aid updated to reflect additions to the collection by Cathy Dorin-Black, 2012 December

controlnote.p: EAD generated by NCSU Libraries' Collection Guides application using data imported from ArchivesSpace.

maintenanceagency.agencyname: North Carolina State University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center

did.unittitle: Don Schmidt Collection of NC State Athletics Memorabilia
did.abstract: The Don Schmidt Collection of NC State Athletics Memorabilia includes rugs, newspaper clippings, magazines, bumper stickers, basketball cards, keychains, buttons and pins, media guides, and other artifacts related to the history of NC State Athletics, primarily the Men's Basketball program. Materials range in date from 1975 to 2000.
Don Schmidt is an NC State alumnus and employee in Outreach, Communications, & Consulting. He and his family have collected NC State athletics memorabilia since the 1970s.
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Special Collections Research Center Reference Staff.

corpname.part: North Carolina State University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center

arrangement.p: This collection has not yet received full archival processing. Materials are arranged in the order received.

bioghist.p: Don Schmidt is an NC State employee in Outreach, Communications, Consulting. He and his family have collected NC State athletics memorabilia since the 1970s.

prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Don Schmidt Collection of NC State Athletics Memorabilia, MC 00462, Special Collections Research Center, North Carolina State University Libraries, Raleigh, NC

processinfo.p: Processed by Cathy Dorin-Black, 2012 October; Finding aid written by Cathy Dorin-Black, 2012 October.

scopecontent.p: The Don Schmidt Collection of NC State Athletics Memorabilia includes rugs, newspaper clippings, magazines, bumper stickers, basketball cards, keychains, buttons and pins, media guides, and other artifacts related to the history of NC State Athletics, primarily the Men's Basketball program. Materials range in date from 1975 to 2000.

userestrict.p: The nature of the NCSU Libraries' Special Collections means that copyright or other information about restrictions may be difficult or even impossible to determine despite reasonable efforts. The NCSU Libraries claims only physical ownership of most Special Collections materials.

The materials from our collections are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study, pursuant to U.S. Copyright law. The user must assume full responsibility for any use of the materials, including but not limited to, infringement of copyright and publication rights of reproduced materials. Any materials used for academic research or otherwise should be fully credited with the source.

This collection may contain materials with sensitive or confidential information that is protected under federal or state right to privacy laws and regulations. Researchers are advised that the disclosure of certain information pertaining to identifiable living individuals represented in this collection without the consent of those individuals may have legal ramifications (e.g., a cause of action under common law for invasion of privacy may arise if facts concerning an individual's private life are published that would be deemed highly offensive to a reasonable person) for which North Carolina State University assumes no responsibility.

did.unittitle: "Wolfpack Tracks" record with a note and autograph from Wally Ausley
Rug, reads "This is Wolfpack Country, North Carolina State University"
Cotton throw blanket, reads "NC State University Wolfpack" with Wolf mascot
Mug, reads "N.C. State Wolfpack, National Champions, '83" with a basketball going through a net
Magazines and newspaper clippings pertaining to Wolfpack athletics
Statuette of an NC State player shooting a basketball at a goal post (small)
Statuette of an NC State player shooting a basketball at a goal post (large)
Poster, reads "N.C.S.U. Wolfpack" with Wolf wearing a football uniform
ACC Basketball Tournament Champions Collections Cards, limited edition 40 card set
Rally towels, read "Wolfpack, Just Do It"
Basketball with Wolf's head and "Wolfpack," autographed by the 1990-1991 Men's Basketball Team
Plaque with Wolf mascot, reads "N.C. State, Wolfpack" with plate that reads "Gary Dornburg" underneath
Trophy with plate that reads "North Carolina State University, 1990-1991"
Cassette tapes (2) entitled "The Cardiac Kids," narrated by Wally Ausley with his autograph

accessrestrict.p: Use copies must be made prior to patron use.

did.unittitle: NC State Basketball Program: Duke (February 21, 1990) - Wake Forest (March 4, 1990)

odd.p: Cover reads "Wally Ausley, 30 Years 'The Voice of the Wolfpack,'" and is autographed by Ausley.
